title: Azir tooltip bug
body: When you level up an ability it says what stats will change when you level it up (70 -> 100 damage for example). However the cooldown on the tool tip on everything when you try to level any ability is 0.0 -> 0.0. Really confusing if you need to know what the cooldowns are before you put a point in them.

replies.body: Fixed in next patch! Thanks for the report!
